newsitem.title: USA: U.S. corn weekly export sales highlights--USDA.
newsitem.headline: U.S. corn weekly export sales highlights--USDA.

text.p: USDA corn export sales highlights in latest reporting week:
Net sales of 867,700 MT were 14 percent below the week earlier and 9 percent under the 4-week average.
The primary purchasers were Japan (262,600 MT), Mexico (123,300 MT), Taiwan (111,300 MT), and South Korea (101,200 MT).

Exports of 990,200 MT were 3 percent more than the previous week and 4 percent more than the 4-week average. Japan (505,900 MT) was the leading destination, followed by South Korea (206,200 MT), Taiwan (50,400 MT), and Syria (40,500 MT).
